âœ¨ pasteguard | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To act as a privacy-preserving proxy for Large Language Model (LLM) API calls, preventing sensitive data from being exposed to third-party providers by masking or routing it locally.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ PII Detection (Names, Emails, Phone Numbers, Credit Cards, IBANs, IP Addresses, Locations) â€¢ Secrets Detection (API Keys, Tokens, Private Keys)
ðŸ“– Summary: PasteGuard is an OpenAI-compatible proxy that protects sensitive data by masking Personally Identifiable Information (PII) and secrets before they are sent to external LLM APIs. It offers two modes: Mask Mode for replacing data with placeholders and Route Mode for directing sensitive requests to local LLMs, ensuring data privacy.

ðŸš€ super | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a secure, user-friendly, and highly customizable WiFi router experience for home networks, enabling granular control over device access, security, and network traffic.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ One Password Per WiFi Device â€¢ Policy Based / Zero Trust Network Access â€¢ Per-Device DNS Rules & Ad Block Lists â€¢ Multi-PSK with WPA3 support â€¢ Device Groups & Isolation
ðŸ“– Summary: SPR is an open-source, user-friendly, and secure WiFi router solution designed for home networks. It offers advanced features like per-device WiFi passwords, granular network access control, and integrated ad blocking, all managed through a modern React-based user interface.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ reqpane | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Debugging and analyzing network requests directly within the Chrome browser's side panel.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Request Capture (fetch, XMLHttpRequest) â€¢ Filtering & Search (URL, body, errors, slow requests) â€¢ Multiple View Modes (List, Timeline, Grouped) â€¢ Request Comparison â€¢ Mock Responses
ðŸ“– Summary: Reqpane is a Chrome extension that acts as a side panel debugger for network requests. It intercepts API calls, allows for filtering, viewing, comparing, and mocking responses, and includes advanced features like load testing and field usage detection.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ nightwatcher | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Viewing IP camera streams in a web browser with custom detection capabilities.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Performance: Blazing fast streaming without any delay â€¢ Cross Platform Support: Works on any device with a browser â€¢ Privacy & Extensibility: Local models and custom detection script support â€¢ Simplicity: Minimal navigations and css styles
ðŸ“– Summary: Night Watcher is a web-based IP camera viewer designed for fast, simple, and delay-free streaming in any browser. It supports local models and custom detection scripts, prioritizing privacy and extensibility.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ Grid-Mobile | Dart
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Secure and private real-time location sharing between trusted contacts or groups.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ End-to-End Encryption (E2EE) â€¢ Matrix Protocol Integration â€¢ Cross-Platform (Android/iOS) â€¢ Real-Time Location Sharing â€¢ Self-Hosted Capability
ðŸ“– Summary: Grid is a cross-platform mobile application for iOS and Android that enables secure, end-to-end encrypted (E2EE) location sharing. It leverages the Matrix protocol for communication and offers self-hosting capabilities for enhanced privacy and control.
